description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现行最高级别的行政区划单位，包括省、直辖市、自治区和特别行政区。
description.en: The highest-level administrative division unit in the People's Republic of China, including provinces, direct-administered municipalities, autonomous regions, and special administrative regions.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，是所有省级行政区的上级主权实体。
description.en: A country in East Asia, the sovereign entity superior to all provincial-level administrative divisions.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国开国大典

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国大典
en: The Proclamation of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 标志着中华人民共和国成立的事件，自此开始建立现行的省级行政区划体系。
description.en: The event that marked the founding of the People's Republic of China, after which the current system of provincial-level administrative divisions was established.

description.zh-cn: 在1954年以前，中华人民共和国最高级别的行政区划。
description.en: The highest-level administrative division in the People's Republic of China before 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院首任总理，曾将当时中国的省级行政区名称编成七言诗以便记忆。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who once compiled the names of China's provincial-level administrative divisions at the time into a seven-character poem for easy memorization.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府，负责规定全国行政区划的排列顺序。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, responsible for stipulating the order of national administrative divisions.

nodes.id: 台湾省 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 台湾省 (中华人民共和国)
en: Taiwan Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国法理上的省，绝大部分区域由中华民国实际控制。
description.en: A de jure province of the People's Republic of China, with most of its territory actually controlled by the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国所宣称的台湾省政府驻地（省会）。
description.en: The claimed seat of government (provincial capital) of Taiwan Province by the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 实际控制台湾、澎湖、金门、马祖等岛屿的政权，与中华人民共和国存在主权争议。
description.en: The political entity that actually controls Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, Matsu and other islands, and has sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1997年主权移交前的香港。
description.en: Hong Kong before the transfer of sovereignty in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 1999年主权移交前的澳门。
description.en: Macau before the transfer of sovereignty in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议的国家。
description.en: A country with sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议的国家。
description.en: A country with sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国在南海诸岛存在主权争议的国家。
description.en: A country with sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国存在边界争议的国家。
description.en: A country with border disputes with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国存在边界争议的国家。
description.en: A country with border disputes with the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国在钓鱼岛及其附属岛屿存在主权争议的国家。
description.en: A country with sovereignty disputes with the People's Republic of China over the Diaoyu/Senkaku Islands.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国开国大典

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国大典标志着中华人民共和国的成立，此后建立了现行的省级行政区划体系。
description.en: The Proclamation of the People's Republic of China marked the founding of the PRC, after which the current system of provincial-level administrative divisions was established.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1954年调整行政区划，省级行政区成为最高级别行政区，取代了大行政区原有的地位。
description.en: The People's Republic of China adjusted its administrative divisions in 1954, making provincial-level divisions the highest level, replacing the former status of greater administrative areas.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责规定全国行政区划中省级行政区的排列顺序。
description.en: The State Council of the People's Republic of China is responsible for stipulating the order of provincial-level administrative divisions within the national administrative division system.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 周恩来是中华人民共和国国务院首任总理。
description.en: Zhou Enlai was the first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来曾将当时中国的三十个省级行政区名称编成一首七言诗，以便于民众记忆和了解国家的行政区划。
description.en: Zhou Enlai once compiled the names of China's thirty provincial-level administrative divisions at the time into a seven-character poem to help people memorize and understand the country's administrative divisions.

description.zh-cn: 北京市是中华人民共和国的省级行政区之一（直辖市）。
description.en: Beijing is one of the provincial-level administrative divisions (a direct-administered municipality) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府的驻地位于通州区。
description.en: The seat of the People's Government of Beijing is located in Tongzhou District.

description.zh-cn: 天津市是中华人民共和国的省级行政区之一（直辖市）。
description.en: Tianjin is one of the provincial-level administrative divisions (a direct-administered municipality) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民政府的驻地位于河西区。
description.en: The seat of the People's Government of Tianjin is located in Hexi District.

description.zh-cn: 河北省是中华人民共和国的省级行政区之一（省）。
description.en: Hebei is one of the provincial-level administrative divisions (a province) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 河北省人民政府的驻地位于石家庄市。
description.en: The seat of the People's Government of Hebei is located in Shijiazhuang.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市曾是四川省的一部分，于1997年被设立为直辖市。
description.en: Chongqing was part of Sichuan Province until it was established as a direct-administered municipality in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 海南省曾是广东省的一部分，于1988年建省。
description.en: Hainan was part of Guangdong Province until it was established as a separate province in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1997年7月1日，中华人民共和国恢复对香港行使主权，成立香港特别行政区，结束了英属香港时期。
description.en: On July 1, 1997, the People's Republic of China resumed the exercise of sovereignty over Hong Kong, establishing the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and ending the period of British Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1999年12月20日，中华人民共和国恢复对澳门行使主权，成立澳门特别行政区，结束了葡属澳门时期。
description.en: On December 20, 1999, the People's Republic of China resumed the exercise of sovereignty over Macau, establishing the Macao Special Administrative Region and ending the period of Portuguese Macau.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与中华民国之间存在政治对立和领土主权争议，涉及台湾省、福建省金马地区、广东省东沙群岛及海南省太平岛等。
description.en: There is political opposition and territorial sovereignty dispute between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of China, involving Taiwan Province, the Kinmen and Matsu areas of Fujian Province, the Pratas Islands of Guangdong Province, and Taiping Island of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与越南在南海诸岛存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Vietnam have territorial sovereignty disputes over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与菲律宾在南海诸岛存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and the Philippines have territorial sovereignty disputes over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与马来西亚在南海诸岛存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Malaysia have territorial sovereignty disputes over the South China Sea Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与印度在西藏自治区南部存在领土主权争议（中印边界问题）。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and India have a territorial sovereignty dispute in the southern part of the Tibet Autonomous Region (Sino-Indian border dispute).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与不丹在西藏自治区部分区域存在领土主权争议（中不边界争议）。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Bhutan have a territorial sovereignty dispute in parts of the Tibet Autonomous Region (Bhutan-China border dispute).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与日本在钓鱼岛及其附属岛屿存在领土主权争议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Japan have a territorial sovereignty dispute over the Diaoyu/Senkaku Islands and their surrounding islets.
